Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Controller.Controller
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Controller.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Controller
LoginController is responsible for handling the login phase of the game. It manages the transition from the login state to the ship-building stage for the current player. This class plays a key role in ensuring proper state progression and re-connection handling during the gameplay.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LoginController(Player curPlayer, String gameId)
    Constructs a LoginController instance to manage the login phase for a specific player and game.

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginController

      public LoginController(Player curPlayer, String gameId)
      Constructs a LoginController instance to manage the login phase for a specific player and game.
      Parameters:
      curPlayer - The current player who is in the login phase.
      gameId - The unique identifier of the game session.

  • Method Details

    • nextState

      public void nextState(GameController gc)
      Transitions the current player to the next state in the game lifecycle. Specifically, it changes the state from the login phase to the ship-building phase, handles reconnection status, and assigns a new controller for the next phase.
      Specified by:
      nextState in class Controller
      Parameters:
      gc - the GameController instance managing game-wide state and operations.
